tool_description: Generates a random Integer between given boundaries
name: Random Integer Generator
title: Random Integer Generator

api_list.name: Random Integer Generator

optional_parameters.name: min
optional_parameters.description: Min endpoint of interval. If not given, Integer Minimum Value is used (-2^31)

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Max endpoint of interval. If not given, Integer Maximum Value is used (2^31-1)
